document.bingtitle: Vapiano Restaurant Reviews, Tallinn, Estonia - TripAdvisor
document.description: Not a restaurant of my taste: order foods and drinks from different stations and try to find a place to sit. ... an ordinary restaurant, it is more like a fast food ...

All 344 Tallinn Restaurants» Vapiano Hobujaama tn 10 , Tallinn 10151 , Estonia +3726829010 Website 11 visitor photos Ranked #21 of 344 restaurants in Tallinn 119 Reviews Price range: £3 - £10 Good for: Cheap Eats Dining options: Lunch Spot, Dinner, Takeout, After-hours, Dessert Restaurant details Good for: Cheap Eats Dining options: Lunch Spot, Dinner, Takeout, After-hours, Dessert Update restaurant details Write a Review 119 reviews from our community 85% Recommend Excellent 53 Very good 47 Average 15 Poor 3 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 119 reviews sorted by Date Rating Dutch first English first French first German first Italian first Norwegian first Russian first Swedish first Any Druusi Helsinki Senior Reviewer 8 reviews Reviews in 6 cities 3 helpful votes “Italian food experience” Reviewed 11 July 2012 NEW The food in Vapiano was nice, and you collect all payments on your card before actually paying while exiting. A nice place. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? KalleHelsinki Helsinki Senior Contributor 44 reviews Reviews in 18 cities 33 helpful votes “Italian fast food” Reviewed 10 July 2012 NEW This place has been there already some years and it is one of my favorites in Tallinn. The location is perfect to have a nice quality meal before your ship sails to Helsinki. Maybe 12-15 min walk to the ship. It works even if you have limited time resources, but you can also enjoy a laid back&relaxed dinner... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? kaidakaida Tallinn, Estonia Senior Reviewer 7 reviews Reviews in 4 cities 1 helpful vote “It's OK” Reviewed 10 July 2012 NEW It all depends on which cook you get. Generally it's good, but sometimes they are not able to meet the standard. It's fast food, but beats any fast food chain anytime :) The cooks and waiters/waitresses are generally friendly and smily, which is a great plus. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by kaidakaida for Tallinn RWat88 Atlanta, Georgia, United States Senior Reviewer 7 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “Cheap&quick” Reviewed 29 June 2012 It's not a unique Estonian experience, but good if you want cheap Italian-style food, salads, etc. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by RWat88 for Tallinn Ana S London, United Kingdom Contributor 17 reviews Reviews in 5 cities 1 helpful vote “italian restaurant” Reviewed 27 June 2012 I like italian cousine very much. Nothing special. But pasta and pizza were tasty. Also good price. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 7 more reviews by Ana S for Tallinn abbagoochiette 1 review “Cheap fast food in a classy restaurant” Reviewed 19 June 2012 Good food for the value,real nice and hectic with the feel of a nice"real"restaurant Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Hoon31 Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom Reviewer 4 reviews 3 helpful votes “Modern Italian just outside Old Town” Reviewed 19 June 2012 1 person found this review helpful Came here for lunch, on arrival the welcoming member of staff explained how the system worked (you are given a store credit card which is charged at the varying ordering stations where the food is prepared in front of you) and we were seated. The food is really good value, myself and my girlfriend shared a large antipasto plate, bolognese... More
Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by Hoon31 for Tallinn getaboutalotwales wales Top Contributor 59 reviews Reviews in 24 cities 39 helpful votes “modern pizza/pasta restaurant near Hotel Metropol” Reviewed 11 June 2012 1 person found this review helpful The reataurant was very busy when I went in for lunch.When I arrived I was handed a"credit"card which I took to the bar to order my drink which was scanned onto my"credit"card.The same thing happened when I oredered my calzone pizza.I was also handed a buzzer which buzzed to tell me to go and collect my meal.The pizza... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 6 more reviews by getaboutalotwales for Tallinn McKanu 2 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “Nice and fast place to enjoy pasta” Reviewed 11 June 2012 via mobile Visited second time here to enjoy nice pasta and pizza. Service is exellent. When we came in there where only few people having lunch so we get our orders very soon. Highly Recommend also for families cause kids have their own place to play. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Lynda1961 Ireland Contributor 20 reviews Reviews in 7 cities 9 helpful votes “Cooked in front of you” Reviewed 8 June 2012 2 people found this review helpful We had never been to this style of restaurant, where you chose your pasta,sauce etc go to a desk order it and watch it being cooked, then take it to your table. As people who don't like the concept of'carvery'(ie Serving youself), we weren't sure if we were going to enjoy the experience! It was very busy and... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
